00027 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00028 #include "kvi_qstring.h"
00029 #include "kvi_heapobject.h"
00030 
00031 class KviNetwork;
00032 class KviServer;
00033 class KviProxy;
00034 
00035 class KVIRC_API KviIrcConnectionTarget : public KviHeapObject
00036 {
00037         friend class KviIrcConnectionTargetResolver;
00038 public:
00039         // pServer is a shallow pointer: this class makes a copy of it internally, must NOT be null
00040         // pProxy may be null if a proxy is not desired. this class makes a copy of it internally
00041         KviIrcConnectionTarget(const KviNetwork * pNetwork,
00042                                                         const KviServer * pServer,
00043                                                         const KviProxy * pProxy = 0,
00044                                                         const QString &szBindAddress = QString());
00045         ~KviIrcConnectionTarget();
00046 private:
00047         KviNetwork      * m_pNetwork;        // owned, never null
00048         KviServer       * m_pServer;         // owned, never null
00049         KviProxy        * m_pProxy;          // owned, may be null
00050         QString           m_szBindAddress;   // forced bind address
00051 public:
00052         KviServer * server(){ return m_pServer; };
00053         KviNetwork * network(){ return m_pNetwork; };
00054         KviProxy * proxy(){ return m_pProxy; };
00055         const QString & bindAddress(){ return m_szBindAddress; };
00056         bool hasBindAddress(){ return (!m_szBindAddress.isEmpty()); };
00057         const QString & networkName();
00058         // this allows to force the network name: it should be used only by KviConsole
00059         // but it's KviServerParser (kvi_sp_numeric.cpp) that first
00060         // gets the new network name... thus we make it public
00061         // to remove one level of indirection.
00062         void setNetworkName(const QString &szNetName);
00063 protected:
00064         // this is for KviIrcConnectionTargetResolver only
00065         void clearProxy();
00066         void setBindAddress(const QString &szBindAddress){ m_szBindAddress = szBindAddress; };
00067 };
00068 
00069 #endif //!_KVI_IRCCONNECTIONTARGET_H_
